column1: #text=I was excited for the upcoming party .
#text=I knew that I had a big day ahead of me which would be filled with planning and buying groceries .
#text=i made a list of everything that I would need .
#text=Chips , dip , pretzels , soda , cheese , crackers , frozen pizza , and frozen mozzarella sticks were just some of the things I needed to get .
#text=I drove to the supermarket and decided to get a big shopping cart to put everything in .
#text=I checked my list and then pushed my shopping cart from aisle to aisle .
#text=I saw that the chips were on sale so I was able to get an extra bag .
#text=After all of the snacks I went to the frozen aisle in order to get the pizza and mozzarella sticks .
#text=It was time for checkout so i waited on line until it was my turn .
#text=The cashier scanned my items and I swiped my credit card to pay for them .
#text=She bagged everything up and I was ready to go on my way home .
